fields.description:
A view slides to the right. On a galaxy s3 phone, the view goes off the edge of the screen. On an iphone and early version of android, the view has a new size and is redrawn. ie the top right button is still visible.
clicking on size shows the new size.
The size should remain the same. 
Change the example (search for UNCOMMENT) for the workaround.
fields.summary: Android: View width changes after animation

comments.body: Moving this ticket to engineering as the provided test case works fine on iOS platform but not on Android platform. Please run the attached test on both iOS and Android devices to see the behavior difference.

I am unable to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1 GA
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
